translation.fr_fr: AVERTISSEMENT: La clé de chiffrement n'a pas été entrée. Les informations de carte de crédit stockées ne seront pas affichées et les valeurs saisies ici ne seront pas enregistrées !
translation.bg_bg: ВНИМАНИЕ: Шифриращият ключ не е въведен. Съхранената информация за кредитна карта няма да бъде показана и въведените тук стойности няма да бъдат запазени!
translation.en_us: CAUTION: The encryption key has not been entered. Stored credit card information will not be displayed and values entered here will not be saved!
translation.es_cr: ¡PRECAUCIÓN: La clave de encripción no ha sido declarada. La información guardada no se mostrará y los valores digitados aquí no serán salvados!
translation.nl_nl: Voorzichtig: er is geen versleuteling daarom krijgt u de credit card informatie niet te zien en worden de hier in gevoerde waarde niet opgeslagen!
translation.pt_br: ATENÇÃO: A chave de criptografia não foi inserida. Informação de cartão de crédito não será mostrada e os valores digitados não serão gravados!

translation.bg_bg: Да разреша ли продажбата на артикули от инвентара да дава отрицателна наличност на стоки? PhreeBooks разрешава това
translation.en_us: Allow sales of inventory items resulting in negative stock levels? PhreeBooks allows this and the journal entry resulting in inventory going negative is re-posted when inventory is received to accurately calculate costs.
translation.es_cr: ¿Permita ventas de códigos de inventario que resultan en niveles de inventario negativos? Si es así
translation.nl_nl: Wil u verkopen toe staan die zullen resulteren in negative voorraden? PhreeBooks zal bij het toestaan de journaal post opnieuw boeken wanneer de voorraad wordt aangevuld om de juiste kosten te berekenen.
translation.pt_br: Permitir vendas de itens de inventário resultarem saldo negativo? PhreeBooks permite isto e o lançamento no diário que resultou em estoque negativo é reenviado quando o inventário é recebido para calcular os custos adequadamente.

translation.pt_br: Exigir aprovação administração para ordens acima do limite de crédito.

translation.en_us: To ensure that bookings are not booked by the script as a last resort the entries are stored in the ledger question items This must be completed otherwise the script does not work
translation.es_cr: Para asegurarse que las transacciones no sean registradas por el guión
translation.nl_nl: Om te voorkomen dat boekingen niet geboekt worden wordt door het script wordt als laatste optie de boekingen opgeslagen op de grootboek vraag posten. Dit moet ingevuld worden anders werkt het script niet
translation.pt_br: Para garantir que lançamentos sejam lançados pelo script como último recurso os lançamentos são armazenados como itens em dúvida. Isto deve ser preenchido ou o sript não funcionará.

translation.en_us: You have an entry in a cash account that shouldn't be there.
translation.es_cr: Tiene una transacción en una cuenta de efectivo que no debe estar allí.
translation.nl_nl: U heeft een boeking op geen liquide middelen rekening die daar niet thuis hoort.
translation.pt_br: Você tem um lançamento na Conta Caixa que não deveria estar lá.

translation.fr_fr: Le paiement au vendeur: %s a été ignoré parce que le montant total du paiement est inférieur ou égal à zéro !
translation.en_us: The payment to vendor: %s was skipped because the total payment amount was less than or equal to zero!
translation.es_cr: ¡El pago al proveedor: %s no se hizo ya que el monto de pago total es menor o igual a cero!
translation.nl_nl: De betaling aan leverancier: %s is overgeslagen omdat het totaal bedrag minder of gelijk was aan nul.!
translation.pt_br: O pagamento para o fornecedor: %s não foi realizado porque o valor total do pagamento era menor ou igual a zero!

translation.fr_fr: Il y a des informations de paiement stockées

translation.pt_br: Há informação de pagamento armazenada mas a chave de encriptação não foi definida!

translation.bg_bg: Няма намерени висящи артикули в тази ГСК сметка!

translation.fr_fr: La boîte 'Enregistrer les informations de paiement' a été cochée

translation.en_us: Save Payment Information box was checked but the ecryption key is not present. The receipt was processed but the payment information was not saved!
translation.es_cr: La casilla de salve información de pago estaba marcada pero la clave de encripción no está presente. ¡El recibo fue procesado pero la información de pago no fue salvada!
translation.nl_nl: Het bewaar betalingsinformatie checkbox was geselecteerd maar er is geen versleutelings_sleutel. De boeking is verwerkt maar er is geen betalingsinformatie opgeslagen!
translation.pt_br: A opção Salvar Informação Pagamento foi selecionada mas a chave de encriptação não está definida. O recebimento foi processado mas a informação de pagamento não foi gravada!

translation.fr_fr: L'enregistrement de paiement a été re-posté
translation.hu_hu: Az oldalt frissítetted! Ez az előző kifizetést megismételheti!!

translation.en_us: Sets the display format for displayed and entered dates (default m/d/Y)
translation.es_cr: Fija el formato para mostrar y digitar fechas (predeterminado m/d/Y)
translation.id_id: Sets the display format for displayed and entered dates (default m/d/Y)
translation.nl_nl: Stelt de weergave-indeling voor weergegeven en invoeren van data (standaard m/d/Y)

translation.fr_fr: Cette valeur définit la date de début de l'exercice comptable. FIXÉ PAR LE SYSTÈME.
translation.en_us: Identifies the delimiter used to seperate dates (default /). This must match the delimiter use in the Date format above.
translation.es_cr: Identifica el delimitador a usar para separar fechas (predeterminado /). Este debe coincidir con el delimitador usado en el formato de fecha arriba.
translation.id_id: Identifies the delimiter used to seperate dates (default /). This must match the delimiter use in the Date format above.
translation.nl_nl: Identificeert het scheidingsteken gebruikt om data te splitsen (standaard /). Dit moet overeenkomen met het scheidingsteken gebruiken in de datumnotatie hierboven.
translation.pt_br: Identifica o delimitador utilizado para separar datas (padrão /). Deve ser igual ao delimitador utilizado no formato escolhido acima.

translation.fr_fr: Cette valeur définit la date de fin de l'exercice comptable. FIXÉ PAR LE SYSTÈME.
translation.bg_bg: Указва екранния формат за време (по подразбиране m/d/Y h:i:s a). Отнесете се към php.net date функция за опции на формата.
translation.en_us: Sets the display format for formal with time (default m/d/Y h:i:s a). Refer to the php.net date function for format options.
translation.es_cr: Fija el formato a mostrar para la fecha y hora (predeterminado m/d/Y h:i:s a). Refiérase a la función date en php.net para las posibles opciones de formato.
translation.id_id: Sets the display format for formal with time (default m/d/Y h:i:s a). Refer to the php.net date function for format options.
translation.nl_nl: Stelt de weergave-indeling in met de tijd (standaard m/d/Y h:i:s a). Lees naar de php.net datum functie voor format-opties.
translation.pt_br: o formato de apresentação para entrada e apresentação de datas/hora(padrão m/d/Y h:i:s a).

translation.fr_fr: Cette fonctionnalité ajoute deux champs additionnels aux écrans de commande pour saisir une remise en valeur ou pourcentage sur la commande. Si elle est désactivée
translation.ru_ru: This feature adds two additional fields to the order screens to enter an order level discount value or percent. If disabled
translation.bg_bg: Тази опция добавя две допълнителни полета на екрана за поръчки за въвеждане на стойност или процент на отстъпка при поръчка. Ако е изключена
translation.en_us: This feature adds two additional fields to the order screens to enter an order level discount value or percent. If disabled

translation.nl_nl: Deze functie voegt twee extra velden toe aan de order schermen om een korting te geven als een waarde of procent. Als deze optie uitgeschakeld
translation.pt_br: Esta função insere dois campos adicionais nas telas de ordens para entrar um nível de desconto por ordem ou percentual. Se desabilitado

translation.fr_fr: L'activation cette fonctionnalité fera arrondir par PhreeBooks les taxes calculées par autorité avant l'additon de toutes les autorités applicables. Pour les taux de taxe à une seule autorité
translation.ru_ru: Enabling this feature will cause PhreeBooks to round calculated taxes by authority prior to adding up all applicable authorities. For tax rates with a single authority
translation.bg_bg: Включването на тази опция ще накара PhreeBooks да закръгля изчислените данъци преди да ги добавя един към друг. За данъчни ставки само с един вид данък
translation.en_us: Enabling this feature will cause PhreeBooks to round calculated taxes by authority prior to adding up all applicable authorities. For tax rates with a single authority
translation.id_id: Enabling this feature will cause PhreeBooks to round calculated taxes by authority prior to adding up all applicable authorities. For tax rates with a single authority
translation.nl_nl: Inschakelen van deze functie heeft tot gevolg dat PhreeBooks naar berekende belastingen afrond voordat ze worden opgeteld . Voor de belastingtarieven met een enkele autoriteit
translation.pt_br: Habilitar esta função fará a Contabilidade arredondar taxas calculadas por autoridade antes de lançar em cada autoridade. Para taxas com somente uma autoridade

translation.es_cr: Permita la digitación de datos en las pantallas de órdenes por medio de escaneadores de códigos de barras USB y otros.

Habilite la opción del modo una línea en las pantallas de digitación de órdenes sin mostrar los campos para el precio total y con descuento de volunen. La pantalla en modo una línea muestra solo números de cuenta y no la descripción como sucede en el modo de doble línea.

translation.id_id: Default Accounts Receivables account. Typically an Accounts Receivable type account.
translation.nl_nl: Standaard Debiteuren Grootboek. Doorgaans een type Debiteuren rekening.
translation.pt_br: Conta padrão para utilizar para Contas a Receber. Tipicamente uma conta do tipo Contas a Receber.

translation.fr_fr: Compte par défaut du Grand Livre pour les transactions de vente
translation.ru_ru: Default general ledger account for sales transactions
translation.bg_bg: Сметка по подразбиране за продажби. Обикновено това е сметка от тип Приходи.
translation.en_us: Default account to use for sales transactions. Typically an Income type account.
translation.es_cr: Cuenta predeterminada para transacciones de ventas

translation.nl_nl: Standaard grootboekrekening voor verkopen. Doorgaans een type Ontvangsten rekening.
translation.pt_br: Conta padrão para utilizar para transações de vendas. Tipicamente uma conta do tipo Receitas.

translation.fr_fr: Compte par défaut du Grand Livre recevant les recettes lorsque les clients payent les factures.
translation.ru_ru: General ledger account to apply receipts to when customers pay invoices.
translation.bg_bg: Разплащателна сметка по подразбиране за плащане на фактура от клиент. Обикновено това е сметка от тип Пари.
translation.en_us: Default account to use for receipts to when customers pay invoices. Typically a Cash type account.
translation.es_cr: Cuenta para aplicar recibos de dinero cuando los clientes pagan las facturas.
translation.id_id: Default account to use for receipts to when customers pay invoices. Typically a Cash type account.
translation.nl_nl: Standaard grootboekrekening voor ontvangen gelden. Doorgaans een type liquide middelen rekening.
translation.pt_br: Conta padrão para utilizar para recibos quando clientes pagam faturas. Tipicamente uma conta do tipo Caixa.

translation.fr_fr: Compte par défaut du Grand Livre recevant les remises lorsque les clients payent d'avance avec une remise appliquée.
translation.ru_ru: General ledger account to apply discounts to when customers pay on early schedule with a discount applied.
translation.bg_bg: Сметка по подразбиране за отстъпки когато клиент предплати и има отстъпка. Това обикновено е сметка от тип Приходи.
translation.en_us: Default account to use for discounts to when customers pay on early schedule with a discount applied. Typically a Income type account.
translation.es_cr: Cuenta para aplicar descuentos a clientes de crédito cuando pagan antes del vencimiento de la factura.
translation.id_id: Default account to use for discounts to when customers pay on early schedule with a discount applied. Typically a Income type account.
translation.nl_nl: Standaard grootboekrekening voor korting die klanten krijgen als ze op tijd betalen. Doorgaans een type Ontvangsten rekening.
translation.pt_br: Conta padrão para utilizar para descontos quando clientes pagam antecipadamente com descontos aplicados. Tipicamente uma conta do tipo Receitas.

translation.fr_fr: Compte par défaut pour enregistrer les frais de transport
translation.ru_ru: Default account to record freight charges
translation.bg_bg: Сметка по подразбиране за таксуване на навло. Обикновено това е сметка от тип Приходи.
translation.en_us: Default account to use for freight charges. Typically an Income type account.
translation.es_cr: Cuenta predeterminada para cargos de fletes
translation.id_id: Default account to use for freight charges. Typically an Income type account.
translation.nl_nl: Standaard grootboekrekening voor de verzend kosten. Doorgaans een type Ontvangsten rekening.
translation.pt_br: Conta padrão para utilizar para tarifas de frete. Tipicamente uma conta do tipo Receitas.

translation.fr_fr: Compte espèces par défaut à utiliser pour les dépôts clients
translation.ru_ru: Default cash account to use for customer deposits.
translation.bg_bg: Сметка по подразбиране за касови бележки за клиентски депозити. Обикновено това е сметка от тип Пари.
translation.en_us: Default account to use for cash receipts on a customer deposits. Typically a Cash type account.
translation.es_cr: Cuenta predeterminada para recibos de efectivo en depósitos de clientes. Típicamente una cuenta de tipo Efectivo.
translation.id_id: Default account to use for cash receipts on a customer deposits. Typically a Cash type account.
translation.nl_nl: Standaard geld rekening te gebruiken bij stortingen van klanten.
translation.pt_br: Conta padrão para utilizar para recebimento em espécie em depósitos de clientes. Tipicamente uma conta do tipo Caixa.

translation.fr_fr: Compte par défaut des autres dettes courantes à utiliser pour les dépôts clients.
translation.ru_ru: Default Other Current Liabilities account to use for customer deposits.
translation.bg_bg: Сметка по подразбиране за кредит за клиентски депозити. Обикновено това е сметка от тип Други текущи задължения.
translation.en_us: Default account to use for the credit holding for a customer deposits. Typically an Other Current Liabilities type account.
translation.es_cr: Cuenta predeterminada donde mantener un depósito de un cliente. Típicamente una cuenta del tipo Otras cuentas por pagar.
translation.id_id: Default account to use for the credit holding for a customer deposits. Typically an Other Current Liabilities type account.
translation.nl_nl: Standaard Grootboek voor de klant Stortingen. Normaal Grootboek van het type Overige schulden.
translation.pt_br: Conta padrão para utilizar para crédito aguardando depósito de cliente. Tipicamente uma conta do tipo Outros Passivos Correntes.

translation.bg_bg: Отстъпки при ранно плащане. Оставете процента на нула или ранните дни нула за да изключите отстъпките при ранно плащане.
translation.en_us: Early payment discounts. Leave percent zero or early days zero to disable early payment discounts.
translation.id_id: Early payment discounts. Leave percent zero or early days zero to disable early payment discounts.
translation.nl_nl: Vervroegde betaling kortingen. Laat procent nul of vroege dagen nul om vroege betalingskorting uit te schakelen.
translation.pt_br: Descontos para pagamento antecipado. Deixe percentual zero ou dias antecipados zero para desabilitar Descontos para pagamento antecipado.

translation.fr_fr: Montant par défaut à utiliser pour la limite de crédit client
translation.ru_ru: Default amount to use for customer credit limit.
translation.en_us: Default amount to use for customer credit limit. (%s)
translation.es_cr: Monto del límite de crédito predeterminado a usar para clientes.
translation.id_id: Default amount to use for customer credit limit. (%s)
translation.nl_nl: Standaard bedrag te gebruiken voor de klant kredietlimiet. (%s)
translation.pt_br: Valor padrão para limite de crédito de cliente. (%s)

translation.fr_fr: Le nombre de jours d'échéance du paiement pour usage lorsque les conditions sont acceptées (payable en # jours
translation.ru_ru: The number of days payment is due for use when terms are accepted (due in # of days
translation.es_cr: Número de días en que el pago se vence para usar en ventas de términos (vence en # de días

translation.fr_fr: Le nombre de jours à utiliser pour une remise si paiement anticipé. Utiliser en conjonction avec remise pour paiement anticipé ci-dessous. Entrez 0 pour aucun rabais si prépaiement.
translation.ru_ru: Number of days to use for prepayment discount. Use in conjunction with Prepayment Discount below. Enter 0 for no prepayment discount.
translation.es_cr: Número de días a usar para descuento por prepago. Use junto con el descuento por prepago que se detalla a mas adelante. Digite 0 para ningún descuento por prepago.

translation.fr_fr: Pourcentage de remise pour paiement anticipé. Inutilisé sauf si le nombre de jours de remise pour prépaiement est égal à zéro.
translation.ru_ru: Percent discount for early payment. Not used unless Prepayment Discount Number of Days is equal to zero.
translation.es_cr: Descuento por prepago en porcentaje. No use a no ser que el número de días para el descuento por prepago sea igual a cero.

translation.fr_fr: Détermine le nombre de jours pour le premier avertissement de factures en souffrance. Le délai court à partir de la date de début de vieillissement de compte.
translation.ru_ru: Determines the number of days for the first warning of past due invoices. The period starts from the Account Aging Start Date Field.
translation.bg_bg: Определя броя на дните за първото предупреждение за просрочени фактури. Периода започва от полето за начална дата на стареене на сметките.
translation.en_us: Determines the number of days for the first warning of past due invoices. The period starts from the Account Aging Start Date Field.
translation.es_cr: Número de días para la primera advertencia de vencimiento de las facturas. El período comienza en la fecha del comienzo de la Antigüedad.
translation.id_id: Determines the number of days for the first warning of past due invoices. The period starts from the Account Aging Start Date Field.
translation.nl_nl: Bepaalt het aantal dagen voor de eerste waarschuwing van achterstallige facturen. De periode start vanaf de Startdatum Factuur Leeftijd veld.
translation.pt_br: Determina o número de dias para o primeiro aviso da atraso de pagamento. O período inicia a partir da data inicial para atraso contas.

translation.fr_fr: Détermine le nombre de jours pour le premier avertissement de factures en souffrance. Le délai court à partir de la date de début de vieillissement de compte.
translation.ru_ru: Determines the number of days for the first warning of past due invoices. The period starts from the Account Aging Start Date Field.

translation.es_cr: Número de días para la segunda advertencia de vencimiento de las facturas. El período comienza en la fecha del comienzo de la Antigüedad.
translation.id_id: Determines the number of days for the second warning of past due invoices. The period starts from the Account Aging Start Date Field.
translation.nl_nl: Bepaalt het aantal dagen voor de tweede waarschuwing van achterstallige facturen. De periode start vanaf de Startdatum Factuur Leeftijd veld.
translation.pt_br: Determina o número de dias para o segundo aviso da atraso de pagamento. O período inicia a partir da data inicial para atraso contas.

translation.ru_ru: Determines the number of days for the first warning of past due invoices. The period starts from the Account Aging Start Date Field.

translation.en_us: Determines the number of days for the third warning of past due invoices. The period starts from the Account Aging Start Date Field.
translation.es_cr: Número de días para la tercera advertencia de vencimiento de las facturas. El período comienza en la fecha del comienzo de la Antigüedad.
translation.id_id: Determines the number of days for the third warning of past due invoices. The period starts from the Account Aging Start Date Field.
translation.nl_nl: Bepaalt het aantal dagen voor de derde waarschuwing van achterstallige facturen. De periode start vanaf de Startdatum Factuur Leeftijd veld.
translation.pt_br: Determina o número de dias para o terceiro aviso da atraso de pagamento. O período inicia a partir da data inicial para atraso contas.

translation.fr_fr: C'est l'en-tête utilisée sur les rapports pour montrer le vieillissement de compte pour la date d'échéance n°2.

translation.nl_nl: Deze koptekst wordt weergegeven in rapporten om de tweede leeftijds periode te tonen.
translation.pt_br: Texto utilizado nos relatórios para mostrar atraso a partir da data número 2.

translation.fr_fr: Détermine si oui ou non calculer les frais de financement sur les factures échues.
translation.ru_ru: Determines whether or not to calculate finance charges on past due invoices.
translation.bg_bg: Определя дали да калкулира цените на просрочените фактури.

translation.nl_nl: Bepaalt of er rente betaald moet worden op vervallen facturen.
translation.pt_br: Determina o cálculo ou não de encargos financeiros sobre atraso de pagamentos.

translation.es_cr: Sume los cargos por envíos al cálculo del impuesto de ventas. Si no se habilita
translation.nl_nl: Als ingeschakeld wordt de verzendkosten meegenomen in de berekening van de belastingen. Als uitgeschakeld worden er geen belastingen over de verzendkosten berekend.

translation.es_cr: Asigne automáticamente un número de identificación al cliente/proveedor nuevo en el momento de su creación.

translation.fr_fr: Cette fonction affiche un popup état client sur les écrans de commande lorsqu'un client est sélectionné dans la fenêtre contextuelle recherche de contact. Il affiche les soldes
translation.ru_ru: This feature displays a customer status popup on the order screens when a customer is selected from the contact search popup. It displays balances
translation.bg_bg: Тази опция показва прозорче със статуса на клиента на екрана за поръчки при избор на клиент от прозореца за търсене на контакти. Показва салдата
translation.en_us: This feature displays a customer status popup on the order screens when a customer is selected from the contact search popup. It displays balances
translation.es_cr: Muestre la ventana de estatus de la cuenta en las pantallas de órdenes cuando el cliente se selecciona de la ventanilla de búsqueda. Muestra los saldos
translation.id_id: This feature displays a customer status popup on the order screens when a customer is selected from the contact search popup. It displays balances
translation.nl_nl: Deze functie geeft de status van een klant in popup-schermen als bij een order een klant is geselecteerd in het pop-up contact zoeken. Het toont de balans
translation.pt_br: Esta função mostra o status do fornecedor em uma janela popup na tela de ordens quando o cliente é selecionadodo popup de busca de contatos. Mostra saldos

translation.fr_fr: Si les remises niveau commande sont activées
translation.ru_ru: If order level discounts are enabled
translation.bg_bg: Ако са включени отстъпки на ниво поръчка
translation.en_us: If order level discounts are enabled (in PhreeBooks Module > General)
translation.es_cr: Habilite descuentos por volumen de la orden. Esta opción determina si el impuesto de ventas se calcula antes o después de que se le aplica el descuento a la orden de venta
translation.id_id: If order level discounts are enabled
translation.nl_nl: Dit bepaalt of de omzetbelasting is berekend voor of nadat de korting wordt toegepast op Verkooporders
translation.pt_br: Se nível de descontos por ordem está habilitado

translation.fr_fr: Compte par défaut pour tous les articles sauf si spécifié dans l'enregistrement individuel de l'article.
translation.ru_ru: The default account for all items unless specified in the individual item record.
translation.bg_bg: Сметка по подразбиране за получени артикули. Тази сметка може да бъде презаписана при въвеждане на определен артикул. Обикновено това е сметка от тип 'Инвентар' или 'Разходи'
translation.en_us: Default account to use for received items. This account can be over written through the individual item record. Typically an Inventory or Expense type account.
translation.es_cr: Cuenta predeterminada para todos los códigos a no ser que se especifique otra cuenta en la pantalla del código.
translation.id_id: Default account to use for received items. This account can be over written through the individual item record. Typically an Inventory or Expense type account.
translation.nl_nl: De standaard rekening voor alle items tenzij anders vermeld in de afzonderlijke post.
translation.pt_br: Conta padrão para utilizar para itens recebidos. Esta conta pode ser substituida pela conta individual do item. Tipicamente uma conta do tipo Inventário ou Despesas.

translation.fr_fr: Compte par défaut du Grand Livre pour tous les achats sauf si spécifié dans l'enregistrement individuel du fournisseur.
translation.ru_ru: The default account for all purchases unless specified in the individual vendor record.
translation.bg_bg: Сметка по подразбиране за всички покупки освен ако не е оказано друго при въвеждането на определен доставчик. Обикновено това е сметка от тип 'Доставчици'
translation.en_us: Default account to use for all purchases unless specified in the individual vendor record. Typically a Accounts Payable type account.
translation.es_cr: Cuenta Predeterminada para todas las compras a no ser que se especifique otra cuenta en la pantalla del proveedor.
translation.id_id: Default account to use for all purchases unless specified in the individual vendor record. Typically a Accounts Payable type account.
translation.nl_nl: De standaard rekening voor alle aankopen tenzij aangegeven in de individuele inkoop records.
translation.pt_br: Conta padrão para utilizar para todas as compras. Esta conta pode ser substituida pela conta individual do fornecedor. Tipicamente uma conta do tipo Contas Pagar.

translation.fr_fr: Compte par défaut du Grand Livre recevant les paiements lorsque les factures fournisseurs sont payées.
translation.ru_ru: General ledger account to apply payments to when vendor invoices are paid.
translation.bg_bg: Сметка по подразбиране за разплащане когато се плащат фактури към доставчици. Обикновено това е сметка от тип 'Пари'
translation.en_us: Default account to use for payments to when vendor invoices are paid. Typically a Cash type account.
translation.es_cr: Cuenta para aplicar los pagos cuando se pagan las facturas al proveedor.
translation.id_id: Default account to use for payments to when vendor invoices are paid. Typically a Cash type account.
translation.nl_nl: De standaard rekening die gebruikt wordt bij betalingen van facturen.
translation.pt_br: Conta padrão para utilizar para pagamentos quando as faturas de fornecedores são pagas. Tipicamente uma conta do tipo Caixa.

translation.fr_fr: Compte par défaut pour enregistrer les frais de transport des envois fournisseurs
translation.ru_ru: Default account to record freight charges for shipments from vendors
translation.bg_bg: Сметка по подразбиране за такси за превоз за пратки от доставчици. Обикновено това е сметка от тип 'Разходи'
translation.en_us: Default account to use for freight charges for shipments from vendors. Typically an Expense type account.
translation.es_cr: Cuenta predeterminada para los fletes sobre la mercadería comprada a los proveedores
translation.nl_nl: De standaard rekening die gebruikt wordt voor porti van ontvangen goederen
translation.pt_br: Conta padrão para utilizar para freight charges for shipments from vendors. Tipicamente uma conta do tipo Despesas.

translation.fr_fr: Compte d'escompte pour un achat payé avec des conditions d'escompte de paiement anticipé.
translation.ru_ru: The discount account for purchase paid with early discount payment terms
translation.en_us: Default account to use for purchase discounts paid with early discount payment terms. Typically an Accounts Payable type account.

translation.id_id: Default account to use for purchase discounts paid with early discount payment terms. Typically an Accounts Payable type account.
translation.nl_nl: De standaard rekening die gebruikt wordt voor kortingen op aankopen
translation.pt_br: Conta padrão para utilizar para purchase discounts paid with early discount payment terms. Tipicamente uma conta do tipo Contas Pagar.

translation.fr_fr: Compte espèces par défaut à utiliser pour les dépôts fournisseurs.
translation.ru_ru: Default cash account to use for vendor deposits.
translation.bg_bg: Сметка по подразбиране за пари в брой

translation.es_cr: Cuenta predeterminada de efectivo para depósitos de proveedor.

translation.en_us: Default account to use for vendor deposits. Typically an Other Current Liabilities type account.

translation.es_cr: Número de días en que vence el pago (solo use con la opción de fecha de vencimiento y factura vence en # de días)

translation.pt_br: Valor padrão para limite de crédito de fornecedor. (%s)

translation.nl_nl: Als ingeschakeld wordt de verzendkosten meegenomen in de berekening van de belastingen. Als uitgeschakeld worden er geen belastingen over de verzendkosten berekend.

translation.en_us: This feature displays a vendor status popup on the order screens when a vendor is selected from the contact search popup. It displays balances

translation.id_id: This feature displays a vendor status popup on the order screens when a vendor is selected from the contact search popup. It displays balances
translation.nl_nl: Deze functie geeft de status van een leverancier in popup-schermen als bij een order een leveracier is geselecteerd in het pop-up contact zoeken. Het toont de balans
translation.pt_br: Esta função mostra o status do fornecedor em uma janela popup na tela de ordens quando o fornecedor é selecionadodo popup de busca de contatos. Mostra saldos

translation.fr_fr: Si les remises niveau commande sont activées
translation.ru_ru: If order level discounts are enabled
translation.bg_bg: Ако са включени отстъпки на ниво поръчка
translation.en_us: If order level discounts are enabled
translation.es_cr: Si se habilitan los descuentos por volumen
translation.id_id: If order level discounts are enabled
translation.nl_nl: Dit bepaalt of de omzetbelasting is berekend voor of nadat de korting wordt toegepast op Inkooporders
translation.pt_br: Se nível de descontos por ordem está habilitado

translation.fr_fr:
Détermine le taux de taxe par défaut des ventes à utiliser lors de l'ajout de nouveaux articles en stock.

NOTE: Cette valeur est appliquée à stocks Auto-Add mais peut être modifiée dans Inventaire => Écran maintenance. Les taux de taxe sont choisis dans la table tax_rates et doivent être configurés à travers Paramètrage => Taux de taxe des ventes.
translation.ru_ru:
Determines the default sales tax rate to use when adding inventory items.

NOTE: This value is applied to inventory Auto-Add but can be changed in the Inventory => Maintain screen. The tax rates are selected from the table tax_rates and must be setup through Setup => Sales tax Rates.
translation.en_us: Determines the default sales tax rate to use when adding inventory items. NOTE: This value is applied to inventory Auto-Add but can be changed in the Inventory => Maintain screen. The tax rates are selected from the table tax_rates and must be setup through Setup => Sales tax Rates.
translation.es_cr:
Tasa de impuesto de ventas predeterminado a usar en la creación de códigos de inventario.

NOTA: Este valor se aplica en la creación automática de códigos y puede ser cambiada en Inventario => Lista de códigos. La tasa de impuestos se selecciona de una tabla de la base de datos y se debe fijar durante la instalación o cambiarlo en Configuración => Tasa Impuesto de Ventas.
translation.id_id: Determines the default sales tax rate to use when adding inventory items. NOTE: This value is applied to inventory Auto-Add but can be changed in the Inventory => Maintain screen. The tax rates are selected from the table tax_rates and must be setup through Setup => Sales tax Rates.
translation.nl_nl:
Bepaalt het standaard belasting tarief wanneer nieuwe voorraad wordt toegevoegd.

OPMERKING: Deze waarde wordt toegepast op de Auto-voorraad toevoegen maar kan gewijzigd worden in de Voorraad => Onderhoud scherm. De belastingtarieven zijn geselecteerd uit de tabel tax_rates en moet instellen via Setup => Verkoop belastingtarieven.
translation.pt_br: Determina a taxa padrão de vendas para utilizar quando inserir itens de inventário. ATENÇÃO: Este valor é aplicado ao inventário Auto-Add mas pode ser modificado na tela Inventário => Manutenção. Os valores de taxas são selecionados da tabela taxas_valores e devem ser especificadas na tela Setup => Taxas de Vendas.

translation.fr_fr:
Détermine le taux de taxe par défaut des achats à utiliser lors de l'ajout de nouveaux articles en stock.

NOTE: Cette valeur est appliquée à stocks Auto-Add mais peut être modifiée dans Inventaire => Écran maintenance. Les taux de taxe sont choisis dans la table tax_rates et doivent être configurés à travers Paramètrage => Taux de taxe des achats.
translation.ru_ru:
Determines the default purchase tax rate to use when adding inventory items.

NOTE: This value is applied to inventory Auto-Add but can be changed in the Inventory => Maintain screen. The tax rates are selected from the table tax_rates and must be setup through Setup => Purchase tax Rates.
translation.en_us: Determines the default purchase tax rate to use when adding inventory items. NOTE: This value is applied to inventory Auto-Add but can be changed in the Inventory => Maintain screen. The tax rates are selected from the table tax_rates and must be setup through Setup => Purchase tax Rates.
translation.es_cr:
Tasa de impuesto de compras predeterminada a usar en la creación de códigos de inventario.

NOTA: Este valor se aplica en la creación automática de códigos y puede ser cambiada en Inventario => Lista de códigos. La tasa de impuestos se selecciona de una tabla de la base de datos y se debe fijar durante la instalación o cambiarlo en Configuración => Tasa Impuesto Compras.
translation.id_id: Determines the default purchase tax rate to use when adding inventory items. NOTE: This value is applied to inventory Auto-Add but can be changed in the Inventory => Maintain screen. The tax rates are selected from the table tax_rates and must be setup through Setup => Purchase tax Rates.
translation.nl_nl:
Bepaalt het standaard belasting tarief wanneer nieuwe voorraad wordt toegevoegd.

OPMERKING: Deze waarde wordt toegepast op de Auto-voorraad toevoegen maar kan gewijzigd worden in de Voorraad => Onderhoud scherm. De belastingtarieven zijn geselecteerd uit de tabel tax_rates en moet instellen via Setup => Inkoop belastingtarieven.
translation.pt_br: Determina a taxa padrão de compras para utilizar quando inserir itens de inventário. ATENÇÃO: Este valor é aplicado ao inventário Auto-Add mas pode ser modificado na tela Inventário => Manutenção. Os valores de taxas são selecionados da tabela taxas_valores e devem ser especificadas na tela Setup => Taxas de Compras.

translation.fr_fr:
Permet la création automatique des articles en stock dans les écrans de commande.

UGS sont pas requises dans PhreeBooks pour les stocks de type non-traçable. Cette fonction permet la création automatique des numéros de référence dans la table inventaire de la base de données. Le type de stockage utilisé sera des articles en stock. Les comptes GL utilisés seront les comptes par défaut et la méthode de coût pour des articles en stock.
translation.ru_ru:
Allows the automatic creation of inventory items in the order screens.

SKUs are not required in PhreeBooks for non-trackable inventory types. This feature allows for the automatic creation of SKUs in the inventory database table. The inventory type used will be stock items. The GL accounts used will be the default accounts and costing method for stock items.
translation.bg_bg: Разрешава автоматичното създаване на артикули в инвентара на екраните за поръчки. SKUs не се изискват във PhreeBooks за непроследяем тип инвентар. Това позволява автоматично създаване на SKUs в таблицата за инвентар в БД. Използваният тип инвентар ще бъде стока. ГСК сметките ще бъдат сметките по подразбиране и ценообразуващия метод за стоки.
translation.en_us: Allows the automatic creation of inventory items in the order screens. SKUs are not required in PhreeBooks for non-trackable inventory types. This feature allows for the automatic creation of SKUs in the inventory database table. The inventory type used will be stock items. The GL accounts used will be the default accounts and costing method for stock items.
translation.es_cr:
Permite la creación automática de códigos de inventario en las pantallas de órdenes.

En Phreebooks
translation.id_id: Allows the automatic creation of inventory items in the order screens. SKUs are not required in PhreeBooks for non-trackable inventory types. This feature allows for the automatic creation of SKUs in the inventory database table. The inventory type used will be stock items. The GL accounts used will be the default accounts and costing method for stock items.
translation.nl_nl:
Hiermee kan automatisch Voorraad gemaakt worden in de order schermen.

Artikelnummers zijn niet vereist voor niet-traceerbare voorraad typen. Deze functie zorgt voor de automatisch maken van artikelen in de Voorraad database tabel. Het voorraad type gebruikt wordt is: voorraad-item. De grootboekrekeningen gebruikt zullen worden zijn de standaard rekeningen zo ook met de kostprijsberekening Methode.
translation.pt_br: Permite a criação automática de itens de inventário nas telas de ordem de compra. SKUs não são necessários no PhreeBooks para tipos de inventário não rastreáveis. Esta função permite a criação automática de SKUs na tabela de inventário. O tipo de inventário utilizado será item estoque. As contas utilizadas serão as padrões e métodos de custo para item estoque.

translation.fr_fr: Permet à un appel AJAX de remplir les choix possibles lorsque les données sont saisies dans le champ SKU. Cette fonction est utile lorsque les SKU sont connus et accélère le remplissage des formulaires de commande. Peut ralentir les saisies SKU lorsque des scanners à codes barres sont utilisés.
translation.ru_ru: Allows an ajax call to fill in possible choices as data is entered into the SKU field. his feature is helpful when the SKUs are known and expedites filling in order forms. May slow down SKU entries when bar code scanners are used.
translation.bg_bg: Разрешава ajax извикване за попълване на възможния избор при въвеждане на данни в полето SKU. Това е полезно
translation.en_us: Allows an ajax call to fill in possible choices as data is entered into the SKU field. This feature is helpful when the SKUs are known and expedites filling in order forms. May slow down SKU entries when bar code scanners are used.
translation.es_cr: Llena la lista con las opciones en el momento en que se está digitando el campo del código. Esta función es útil cuando se conoce el código ya que acelera el llenado del formulario de órdenes. Sin embargo
translation.id_id: Allows an ajax call to fill in possible choices as data is entered into the SKU field. This feature is helpful when the SKUs are known and expedites filling in order forms. May slow down SKU entries when bar code scanners are used.
translation.nl_nl: Hiermee kan een ajax call de mogelijke keuzen in vullen
translation.pt_br: Permite uma chamada ajax preencher possíveis opções a medida que dados são digitados no campo SKU. Esta função é importante quando os SKUs são conhecidos e agiliza o preenchimento de ordens de compras. Pode tornar lentas entradas de SKU quando leitores de código de barra são utilizados.

translation.fr_fr: Définit le nombre de caractères attendus lors de la lecture de valeurs de codes barres du stock. PhreeBooks effectue une recherche uniquement lorsque le nombre de caractères a été atteint. Des valeurs typiques sont 12 et 13 caractères.
translation.ru_ru: Sets the number of characters to expect when reading inventory bar code values. PhreeBooks only searches when the number of characters has been reached. Typical values are 12 and 13 characters.
translation.en_us: Sets the number of characters to expect when reading inventory bar code values. PhreeBooks only searches when the number of characters has been reached. Typical values are 12 and 13 characters.
translation.es_cr: Fija el número de caracteres esperado cuando se está leyendo códigos de barras. PhreeBooks empieza la búsqueda solo después de que se alcanza el número de caracteres. Valores típicos son de 12 ó 13 caracteres.
translation.id_id: Sets the number of characters to expect when reading inventory bar code values. PhreeBooks only searches when the number of characters has been reached. Typical values are 12 and 13 characters.
translation.nl_nl: Stelt het aantal tekens te verwachten bij het lezen van voorraad streepjescode. PhreeBooks zoekt alleen wanneer het aantal tekens is bereikt. Typische waarden zijn 12 en 13 tekens.
translation.pt_br: Estabelece o número de caracteres esperados quando leitores de código de barra são utilizados. PhreeBooks só realiza a busca quando o número de caracteres foi atingido. Valores típicos são 12 ou 13 caracteres.

translation.fr_fr: Vérifier automatiquement les mises à jour du logiciel lors de la connexion à PhreeBooks.
translation.ru_ru: Automatically check for program updates at login to PhreeBooks.
translation.bg_bg: Автоматична проверка за ъпдейти на програмата при логване във PhreeBooks.
translation.en_us: Automatically check for program updates at login to PhreeBooks.
translation.es_cr: Automáticamene revisa a ver si hay actualizaciones del programa cuando hace el login a PhreeBooks.
translation.id_id: Automatically check for program updates at login to PhreeBooks.
translation.nl_nl: Automatisch controleren op programma updates bij het login.
translation.pt_br: Verificar automaticamente novas versões do PhreeBooks.

translation.fr_fr:
Cacher les messages sur les opérations réussies.
Seuls les messages d'attention et d'erreur seront affichés.
translation.ru_ru:
Hides messages on successful operations.
Only caution and error messages will be displayed.
translation.bg_bg: Скрива съобщенията за успешните операции. Само предупрежденията и съобщенията за грешка ще бъдат показвани.
translation.en_us: Hides messages on successful operations. Only caution and error messages will be displayed.
translation.es_cr:
Esconda mensajes de notificación de operaciones realizadas exitósamente.
Solo muestre mensajes de precaución y error.
translation.id_id: Hides messages on successful operations. Only caution and error messages will be displayed.
translation.nl_nl:
Verbergt succes berichten.
Alleen voorzichtig en foutmeldingen worden weergegeven.
translation.pt_br: Não apresenta mensagens em operações bem sucedidas. Somente mensagens de ATENÇÃO e ERRO serão mostradas.

translation.fr_fr:
Mise à jour du taux de change des devises chargées à chaque connexion.
Si désactivé
translation.ru_ru:
Updates the exchange rate for loaded currencies at every login.
If disabled
translation.bg_bg:
Обновява обменния курс за заредените валути на всеки логин.
Ако е изключено
translation.en_us:
Updates the exchange rate for loaded currencies at every login.
If disabled
translation.es_cr:
Actualiza automáticamente el tipo de cambio de todas las monedas definidas con cada login.
Si se desabilita
translation.id_id:
Updates the exchange rate for loaded currencies at every login.
If disabled
translation.nl_nl:
Update de wisselkoers van valuta bij elke login.
Indien uitgeschakeld kunnen valuta handmatig worden aangepast in het menu Setup => Valuta.
translation.pt_br:
Atualiza as taxas de conversão das moedas carregadas em todo login.
Se desabilitado

translation.fr_fr: Limite la longueur des valeurs de l'historique montrées dans les comptes client/fournisseur pour les ventes/achats.
translation.ru_ru: Limits the length of history values shown in customer/vendor accounts for sales/purchases.
translation.bg_bg: Ограничава дължината на историята показвана в сметките клиент/доставчик за продажби/покупки.
translation.en_us: Limits the length of history values shown in customer/vendor accounts for sales/purchases.
translation.es_cr: Limita la cantidad de Ventas/Compras históricas que se muestran para cuentas de clientes/proveedores.
translation.id_id: Limits the length of history values shown in customer/vendor accounts for sales/purchases.
translation.nl_nl: Beperkt de geschiedenis in de klant / leverancier accounts van verkopen en inkopen.
translation.pt_br: Limita o tamanho dos valores históricos mostrados nas contas de cliente/fornecedor para vendas/compras.

translation.fr_fr: Spécifie la préférence d'exportation lors de l'exportation des rapports et des formulaires. 'Local' va les sauvegarder dans le répertoire /my_files/reports du serveur web pour être utilisés avec toutes les sociétés. 'Download' va télécharger le fichier par votre navigateur pour le sauvegarder/l'imprimer sur votre machine locale.
translation.ru_ru: Specifies the export preference when exporting reports and forms. Local will save them in the /my_files/reports directory of the webserver for use with all companies. Download will download the file to your browser to save/print on your local machine.
translation.en_us: Specifies the export preference when exporting reports and forms. Local will save them in the /my_files/reports directory of the webserver for use with all companies. Download will download the file to your browser to save/print on your local machine.
translation.es_cr: Especifica las preferencias de exportación cuando se exportan reportes y formularios. La opción local salvará el archivo del reporte en el directorio /my_files/reports del servidor para poder ser usado por todas las compañías. Descargar bajará el archivo a su navegador de donde podrá salvar/imprimir el reporte desde su computador.
translation.id_id: Specifies the export preference when exporting reports and forms. Local will save them in the /my_files/reports directory of the webserver for use with all companies. Download will download the file to your browser to save/print on your local machine.
translation.nl_nl: Bepaalt de standaard export voorkeur van rapporten en formulieren. Lokaal zal ze opslaan in de /my_files/reports directory van de webserver
translation.pt_br: Especifica a preferência de exportação quando exportando relatórios e formulários. Local vai salvá-los no diretório /my_files/reports do sevidor web para uso de todas as empresas. Download vai baixar o arquivo no seu browser para salvar/imprimir na máquina local.

translation.fr_fr:
Définit l'unité de mesure par défaut pour tous les colis. Les valeurs valides sont:
LBS - Livres
KGS - Kilogrammes
translation.ru_ru:
Sets the default unit of measure for all packages. Valid values are:
LBS - Pounds
KGS - Kilograms
translation.bg_bg: Sets the default unit of measure for all packages. Valid values are: Pounds
translation.en_us: Sets the default unit of measure for all packages. Valid values are: Pounds
translation.es_cr:
Unidad de medida de peso predeterminada para los pesos de todos los paquetes. Valores válidos son:
LBS - Libra
KGS - Kilogramos
translation.id_id: Sets the default unit of measure for all packages. Valid values are: Pounds
translation.nl_nl: Stelt de standaard meeteenheid voor alle pakketten. Geldige waarden zijn: LBS - Ponden
translation.pt_br: Especifica a unidade de medida para todos os volumes. Valores válidos são: quilos

Les valeurs valides sont
USD - Dollars US
EUR - Euros

Valid values are
USD - US Dollars
EUR - Euros

Valores válidos son
USD - US Dólares
EUR - Euros

Package unit of measure. Valid values are:

PULG -Pulgadas

translation.fr_fr:
0 - Définit la case de livraison à résidence par défaut comme décochée (adresse commerciale)
1 - Définit la case de livraison à résidence par défaut comme cochée (adresse de résidence)
translation.ru_ru:
0 - Sets the default residential ship box to unchecked (commercial address)
1 - Sets the default residential ship box to checked (residential address)
translation.es_cr:
0 - Fija como predeterminado la casilla de envíe a dirección residencial y marcado (dirección comercial)
1 - Fija como predeterminado la casilla de envíe a dirección residencial y marcado (dirección residencial)
translation.nl_nl: Standaard residentiële verzend doos (niet aangevinkt - Commercieel

translation.fr_fr: Affiche la case à cocher de frais de manutention .
translation.es_cr: Muestre la casilla de cargos por manejo.

translation.fr_fr:
Définit la méthode d'envoi des courriels.

PHP est la valeur par défaut
translation.ru_ru:
Defines the method for sending mail.
PHP is the default
translation.bg_bg:
Определя начина за изпращане на email.
PHP е по подразбиране
translation.en_us:
Defines the method for sending mail.
PHP is the default
translation.es_cr:
Define el método para enviar correo.
PHP es el predeterminado
translation.id_id:
Defines the method for sending mail.
PHP is the default
translation.nl_nl:
Bepaalt de methode voor het verzenden van mail.
PHP is de standaard
translation.pt_br:
Define o método de envio de email.
PHP é o padrão

translation.fr_fr: Adresse e-mail du propriétaire du magasin. Utilisée en "affichage uniquement" pour informer les clients sur la façon de vous contacter.
translation.bg_bg: Email адрес на собственика на склада. Използва се 'само за показване' когато трябва да се информират клиентите как да се свържат.
translation.en_us: Email address of Store Owner. Used as "display only" when informing customers of how to contact you.
translation.es_cr: Dirección de correo electrónico de la compañía. Use 'Solo muestre' para informarle a los clientes como contactarlo a Usted.
translation.nl_nl: E-mail adres van de eigenaar van de winkel. Gebruikt als 'alleen tonen' bij het informeren van klanten over hoe contact met u op te nemen.
translation.pt_br: Endereço email do Proprietário. Utilizado como 'somente visualização' quando informando clientes como contactá-lo.

translation.fr_fr: Adresse depuis laquelle les messages e-mails seront "envoyés" par défaut. Peut être supplantée lors de la composition dans les modules admin.
translation.bg_bg: Адрес от който email съобщения ще бъдат 'изпратени' по подразбиране. Може да бъде овъррайднат по време на съставянето на съобщението в модула за администрация.
translation.en_us: Address from which email messages will be "sent" by default. Can be over-ridden at compose-time in admin modules.
translation.es_cr: Dirección predeterminada de dónde los mensajes serán 'enviados'. Puede ser cambiado a la hora de componer el correo en los módulos admin.
translation.nl_nl: Adres waar e-mailberichten standaard 'Vandaan' verzonden worden. Kan gewijzigd worden in de admin modules tijdens verzending.
translation.pt_br: Endereço a partir do qual mensagens de email serão enviadas por padrão. Pode ser sobreposto no momento de escrever o email nos módulos de admin.

translation.fr_fr:
Entrez le nom du compte de boîte aux lettres (me@mydomain.com) fourni par votre hébergeur. C'est le nom du compte dont votre hôte a besoin pour l'authentification SMTP.
Uniquement nécessaire si vous utilisez l'authentification SMTP pour le courrier électronique.
translation.ru_ru:
Enter the mailbox account name (me@mydomain.com) supplied by your host. This is the account name that your host requires for SMTP authentication.
Only required if using SMTP Authentication for email.
translation.en_us: Enter the mailbox account name (me@mydomain.com) supplied by your host. This is the account name that your host requires for SMTP authentication. (Only required if using SMTP Authentication for email)
translation.es_cr:
Digite el nombre de la cuenta de correo (yo@midominio.com) que le dió su administrador del servidor. Este es el nombre de la cuenta que su servidor requiere para autentificación SMTP.
Solo se necesita si el servidor está usando autentificación SMTP.
translation.id_id: Enter the mailbox account name (me@mydomain.com) supplied by your host. This is the account name that your host requires for SMTP authentication. (Only required if using SMTP Authentication for email)
translation.nl_nl:
Voer de mail account naam in (me@mydomain.com) Geleverd door uw host. Dit is de account naam die uw host voor SMTP-verificatie vereist.
Alleen verplicht als u SMTP-verificatie(SMTPAUTH) gebruikt voor e-mail.
translation.pt_br: Entre a conta de email me@meudominio.com). Esta á a conta de email que requer autenticação SMTP. (Só é necessária se estiver utilizando Autenticação SMTP para email)

translation.fr_fr:
Entrez le mot de passe pour votre boîte aux lettres SMTP.
Uniquement nécessaire si vous utilisez l'authentification SMTP pour le courrier électronique.
translation.ru_ru:
Enter the password for your SMTP mailbox.
Only required if using SMTP Authentication for email.
translation.bg_bg: Въведете паролата за вашия SMTP мейлбокс. (Изисква се само при използване на SMTP автентикация за email)
translation.en_us: Enter the password for your SMTP mailbox. (Only required if using SMTP Authentication for email)
translation.es_cr:
Digite la Contraseña SMTP de su correo.
Solo se necesita si el servidor está usando autentificación SMTP.
translation.id_id: Enter the password for your SMTP mailbox. (Only required if using SMTP Authentication for email)
translation.nl_nl: Voer het wachtwoord in voor uw SMTP mailbox. Alleen nodig als u SMTP-verificatie(SMTPAUTH) gebruikt voor e-mail.
translation.pt_br: Entre a senha para sua caixa SMTP. (Only required if using SMTP Authentication for email)

translation.fr_fr:
Entrez le nom DNS de votre serveur de messagerie SMTP.
Exemple: mail.mydomain.com
ou 55.66.77.88
Uniquement nécessaire si vous utilisez l'authentification SMTP pour le courrier électronique.
translation.ru_ru:
Enter the DNS name of your SMTP mail server.
ie: mail.mydomain.com
or 55.66.77.88
Only required if using SMTP Authentication for email.
translation.bg_bg: Въведете DNS името на вашия SMTP пощенски сървър. например mail.mydomain.com или 55.66.77.88 (Изисква се само при използване на SMTP автентикация за email)
translation.en_us: Enter the DNS name of your SMTP mail server. i.e. mail.mydomain.com or 55.66.77.88 (Only required if using SMTP Authentication for email)
translation.es_cr:
Digite el nombre del servidor DNS de su servidor SMTP de correos.
ie: correo.midominio.com
ó 55.66.77.88
Solo se necesita si el servidor esta usando autentificación SMTP.
translation.id_id: Enter the DNS name of your SMTP mail server. i.e. mail.mydomain.com or 55.66.77.88 (Only required if using SMTP Authentication for email)

translation.fr_fr:
Détermine la manière d'afficher les comptes du Grand Livre dans les menus déroulants.
Nombre - Numéro de compte GL seulement.
Description - Description de compte GL uniquement.
Les 2 - Le numéro et le nom de compte GL seront affichés.
translation.ru_ru:
Determines how to display the general ledger accounts in pull-down menus.
Number - GL Account Number Only.
Description - GL Account Description Only.
Both - Both gl number and name will be displayed.
translation.bg_bg:
Определя как да покаже сметките от ГСК в менюто
Номер - Само номер на сметка от ГСК.
Описание - Само описание на ГСК сметка.
И двете - Ще бъдат показани и номера на сметката и името.
translation.en_us:
Determines how to display the general ledger accounts in pull-down menus.
Number - GL Account Number Only.
Description - GL Account Description Only.
Both - Both gl number and name will be displayed.
translation.es_cr:
Preferencia para mostrar las cuentas en las listas plegables:
Número - solo el número de cuenta.
Descripción - Solo la descripción de cuenta.
Ambos - Muestre ambos
translation.id_id:
Determines how to display the general ledger accounts in pull-down menus.
Number - GL Account Number Only.
Description - GL Account Description Only.
Both - Both gl number and name will be displayed.
translation.nl_nl:
Bepaalt hoe het grootboek rekeningen in pull-down menu's weer te geven.
Nummer - Alleen het grootboek rekeningnummer.
Omschrijving - Alleen de grootboek omschrijving.
Beide - Zowel het grootboek nummer als de omschrijving zullen worden getoont.
translation.pt_br:
Determina como mostrar as contas em menus pull-down .
Número - somente número da conta.
Descrição - somente descrição conta.
Ambos - número e descrição serão mostrados.

translation.fr_fr:
Entrez le temps en secondes. Par défaut=3600
Exemple: 3600= 1 heure

Note: trop peu de secondes peut entraîner des problèmes de session expirée lors de l'ajout/modification de produits.
translation.ru_ru:
Enter the time in seconds. Default=3600
Example: 3600= 1 hour

Note: Too few seconds can result in timeout issues when adding/editing products.
translation.bg_bg:
Таймаут на сесията - Въведете време в секунди (3600 по подразбиране). Пример: 3600= 1 час
Забележка: Твърде малко секунди могат да доведат до таймаут проблеми при добавяне/редактиране на продукти.
translation.en_us:
Session Timeout - Enter the time in seconds (default = 3600). Example: 3600= 1 hour
Note: Too few seconds can result in timeout issues when adding/editing products
translation.es_cr:
Digite el tiempo predeterminado en segundos
Ejemplo: 3600= 1 hora

Nota: Muy poco tiempo puede resultar en que le dé problemas de desconección cuando agrega o edita códigos de inventario.
translation.id_id:
Session Timeout - Enter the time in seconds (default = 3600). Example: 3600= 1 hour
Note: Too few seconds can result in timeout issues when adding/editing products.
translation.nl_nl:
Voer de tijd seconden in. (Standaard = 3600). Voorbeeld: 3600 = 1 uur
LET OP: Te weinig seconden kan resulteren in een time-out problemen bij het toevoegen / bewerken van producten.
translation.pt_br:
Limite Tempo Sessão - Entre o tempo em segundos (padrão = 3600). Exemplo: 3600 = 1 hora
Atenção: Poucos segundos podem resultar em problemas ao inserir/editar produtos.

translation.nl_nl: Wanneer deze optie is ingeschakeld zal ajax gebruikt worden om de sessie-timer om de 5 minuten te vernieuwen om afmelden van de gebruiker te voorkomen. Deze functie helpt te voorkomen dat het opslaan mislukt. (wanneer het opslaan resulteert in een login scherm).

translation.fr_fr: SO - Une commande client ne peut pas être supprimée s'il y a des éléments qui ont été expédiés !
translation.hu_hu: Bejövő rendelés - Nem lehet törölni a bejövő rendelést
translation.bg_bg: Поръчка за продажба не може да бъде изтрита
translation.en_us: SO - A sales order cannot be deleted if there are items that have been shipped!
translation.es_cr: ¡Orden de venta - Una orden de venta no se puede borrar si tiene ítems que ya han sido facturados!
translation.nl_nl: VO - Een verkoop order kan niet worden verwijderd als er items die zijn verstuurd!
translation.pt_br: OV - Uma ordem de venda não pode ser removida se há itens que já foram entregues!

translation.fr_fr: S/I - Une facture ne peut pas être supprimée s'il y a eu un avoir ou un paiement appliqué !
translation.hu_hu: S/I - Nem lehet törölni a számlát
translation.ru_ru: S/I - An invoice cannot be deleted if there has been a credit memo or payment applied!
translation.bg_bg: Фактура/продажба не може да бъде изтрита
translation.en_us: SI - An invoice cannot be deleted if there has been a credit memo or payment applied!
translation.es_cr: ¡SI - No se puede eliminar una factura si tiene una nota de crédito o un pago aplicado!
translation.nl_nl: V/F - Een factuur kan niet verwijderd worden als er sprake is van een creditnota of betaling toegepast!
translation.pt_br: FAT - Uma fatura não pode ser removida se foi emitido um memo de crédito ou um pagamento!

translation.fr_fr: CCM - Un avoir ne peut pas être supprimé s'il y a eu un paiement appliqué !
translation.bg_bg: Кредитно известие към клиент не може да бъде изтрито
translation.en_us: CCM - An credit memo cannot be deleted if there has been a payment applied!

translation.nl_nl: KCB - Een credit boeking kan niet verwijderd worden als er een betaling toegepast is!
translation.pt_br: CMC - Um memo de crédito não pode ser removido se já foi aplicado a um pagamento!

translation.fr_fr: C/R - Une recette ne peut pas être supprimée si l'écriture a été rapprochée avec la banque !
translation.ru_ru: C/R - An receipt cannot be deleted if the entry has been reconciled with the bank!

translation.en_us: CR - An receipt cannot be deleted if the entry has been reconciled with the bank!
translation.es_cr: ¡CR - No se puede eliminar un recibo de dinero si ya ha sido reconciliado con el estado de cuenta del banco!
translation.nl_nl: K/B - Een bon kan niet verwijderd worden als er een betaling toegepast is!
translation.pt_br: CR - Um recebimento não pode ser removido se o lançamento já foi conciliado com o banco!

translation.fr_fr: V/P - Un paiement ne peut pas être supprimé si l'écriture a été rapprochée avec la banque !
translation.hu_hu: P/R - Nem lehet törölni a kifizetést
translation.ru_ru: V/P - A payment cannot be deleted if the entry has been reconciled with the bank!

translation.en_us: VP - A payment cannot be deleted if the entry has been reconciled with the bank!
translation.es_cr: ¡VP - No se puede eliminar un pago si ya ya sido reconciliado con el estado de cuenta del banco!
translation.nl_nl: L/B - Een betaling kan niet worden verwijderd als het geboekt is bij de bank!
translation.pt_br: CP - Um pagamento não pode ser removido se o lançamento já foi conciliado com o banco!

translation.fr_fr: PO - Une commande fournisseur ne peut pas être supprimée s'il y a des éléments qui ont été reçus !
translation.hu_hu: PO - Nem törölhető a kimenő rendelés
translation.bg_bg: Поръчка за покупка не може да бъде изтрита

translation.es_cr: ¡Orden de compra - No se puede borrar una orden de compra si tiene mercadería que ya ha sido recibida!

translation.pt_br: OC - Uma ordem de compra não pode ser removida se há itens que já foram recebidos!

translation.fr_fr: P/R - Un achat ne peut pas être supprimé s'il y a eu un avoir ou un paiement appliqué !
translation.hu_hu: P/R - Nem lehet törölni a beszerzést
translation.ru_ru: P/R - A purchase cannot be deleted if there has been a credit memo or payment applied!
translation.bg_bg: Поръчка не може да бъде изтрита
translation.en_us: PR - A purchase cannot be deleted if there has been a credit memo or payment applied!
translation.es_cr: ¡PR - No se puede eliminar una compra si tiene una nota de crédito o un pago aplicado!
translation.nl_nl: I/O - Een aankoop kan niet verwijderd worden als er sprake is van een creditnota of betaling toegepast!
translation.pt_br: CO - Uma compra não pode ser removida se foi emitido um memo de crédito ou um pagamento!

translation.fr_fr: VCM - Un avoir ne peut pas être supprimé s'il y a eu un paiement appliqué !

translation.bg_bg: Кредитно известие от доставчик не може да бъде изтрито

translation.es_cr: ¡Nota de crédito de proveedor - Una nota de crédito no se puede borrar si ya tienen un pago aplicado!

translation.es_cr: Actualizado el estatus de la orden actual

translation.ru_ru: Are you sure you want to delete these audit log records?
translation.en_us: Are you sure you want to delete these log records?
translation.es_cr: ¿Está seguro que quiere borrar el registro de auditoría?
translation.nl_nl: Weet u zeker dat u deze audit log records wil verwijderen?
translation.pt_br: Tem certeza de que quer remover estes registros de Log Auditoria?

translation.bg_bg: Тази операция създава свален архив на вашия одит лог файл от базата данни. Това ще помогне размерът на базата данни да се запази малък
translation.en_us:
This operation creates a downloaded backup of your audit log database file. This will help keep the database size down and reduce company backup file sizes. Backing up this log is recommended before cleaning out to preserve PhreeBooks transaction history.
INFORMATION: Cleaning out the audit log will leave the current periods data in the database table and remove all other records.
translation.es_cr:
Esta operación crea y baja un respaldo del archivo de registro de auditoría. Esto sirve para controlar el tamaño del archivo de la base de datos de la compañía y reducir el tamaño del archivo de respaldo. Se recomienda hacer el respaldo del registro de auditoría antes de limpiarlo para preservar la historia de transacciones.
NOTA: La limpieza del registro de auditoría deja la información del período actual y elimina todos los registros anteriores.
translation.nl_nl:
Hiermee maakt u een backup van je gedownload audit log database-bestand. Dit zal helpen de grootte van de database en back-upbestand te beperken. Een back-up van deze log is aanbevolen voor het schoonmaken van de transactie te bewaren PhreeBooks geschiedenis.
INFORMATIE: Het reinigen van de audit log laat de huidige perioden gegevens in de database tabel en verwijdert alle andere records.
translation.pt_br: Esta operação cria uma cópia de segurança do seus arquivos de Logs de Auditoria. Isto vai ajudar a manter o tamanho da base de dados menor e reduzirá a necessidade de espaço de backup para a empresa. Fazer cópia de segurança deste log é recomendado antes de limpá-lo

translation.en_us: Your inventory_cogs_owed table currently has %s entries in it. This tool will attempt to re-post all entries in the inventory_cogs_owed table. The inventory_cogs_owed table should not have any entries in it unless the stock levels are negative. If the table has items listed and the stock levels are zero or greater
translation.nl_nl:
Uw inventory_cogs_owed tabel heeft op dit moment %s regels.
Deze tool zal alle regels controleren en opnieuw op slaan.
De inventory_cogs_owed tabel zou geen regels moeten bevatten tenzij de voorraad niveau's negatief zijn.
Als de tabel items bevat en de voorraad niveaus zijn nul of groter dan zal deze tool proberen om de tabel te repareren door het her-opslaan van de journaal posten.
Er waren problemen met release R3.6 en ouder. U kunt in een rapport be kijken welke items in uw cogs_owed tabel staan.

translation.en_us: Are you sure you want to re-post the inventory owed?\n\nYOU SHOULD BACKUP YOUR COMPANY BEFORE DOING THIS!
translation.nl_nl: Weet u zeker dat u de kosten van de verkoop opnieuw wil opslaan?\n\nU ZOU EEN BACKUP MOETEN MAKEN VOORDAT U DIT DOET!

translation.en_us: The starting balance in period %s for account %s is: %s compaired with: %s
translation.nl_nl: De start balans in periode %s voor rekening %s is: %s en zou moeten zijn: %s

translation.bg_bg: Тази операция валидира и възстановява салдата в сметкоплана. Ако оборотната ведомост или баланса не са балансирани
translation.en_us: This operation validates and repairs the chart of account balances. If the trial balance or balance sheet are not in balance
translation.es_cr: Esta operación revalida y repara los saldos de las cuentas del catálogo de cuentas. Si el balance de prueba o el balance general no están balanceados aquí es donde debe comenzar. Primero revalide los saldos para ver si hay errores y repare si es necesario.
translation.nl_nl: Deze handeling valideert en repareert de balans van de grootboekrekeningen. Als de proefbalans of de balans niet in balans zijn
translation.pt_br: Esta operação valida e corrige os saldos do plano de contas. Se os saldos de balancete e plano de contas não batem

translation.bg_bg: Сигурни ли сте че желаете да възстановите салдата в ГСК?\n\nТРЯБВА ДА ОТПЕЧАТАТЕ ФИНАНСОВИ ОТЧЕТИ И ДА НАПРАВИТЕ АРХИВ НА ФИРМАТА ПРЕДИ ТОВА!
translation.en_us: Are you sure you want to repair the general ledger balances?\n\nYOU SHOULD PRINT FINANCIAL SATEMENTS AND BACKUP YOUR COMPANY BEFORE DOING THIS!
translation.es_cr: ¿Está seguro que quiere reparar saldos de cuentas?\n\n¡DEBE IMPRIMIR LOS ESTADOS FINANCIEROS Y RESPALDAR EL ARCHIVO DE COMPAÑÍA ANTES DE HACER ESTA OPERACIÓN!
translation.nl_nl: Weet u zeker dat u de balans van de grootboekrekeningen wilt repareren?\n\nHET IS VERSTANDIG OM VERSCHILLENDE RAPPORTEN TE PRINTEN EN UW DATA TE BACK-UPPEN VOORDAT U VERDER GAAT!
translation.pt_br: Tem certeza de que quer corrigir os saldos da CG?\n\nVOCÊ DEVE IMPRIMIR OS RELATÓRIOS FINANCEIROS E FAZER CÓPIA DE SEGURANÇA ANTES!

translation.bg_bg: Трябва да възстановите салдата . ВНИМАНИЕ: НАПРАВЕТЕ АРХИВ ПРЕДИ ДА ВЪЗСТАНОВИТЕ САЛДАТА В СМЕТКОПЛАНА!
translation.en_us: You should repair the chart balance. NOTE: BACKUP BEFORE YOU REPAIR THE CHART OF ACCOUNTS BALANCES!
translation.es_cr: Debe reparar los saldos de las cuentas. NOTA: RESPALDE SU COMPAÑÍA ANTES DE REPARAR LOS SALDOS DE LAS CUENTAS!
translation.nl_nl: U zou de balans moeten repareren. BELANGRIJK: MAAK EEN BACK-UP VOORDAT U DE BALANS GAAT REPAREREN!
translation.pt_br: Você deve corrigir os saldos de seu plano de contas. ATENÇÃO: FAÇA CÓPIA DE SEGURANÇA ANTES DE CORRIGIR OS SALDOS DO PLANO DE CONTAS!

translation.nl_nl: Weet u zeker dat u de geselecteerde journaalposten opnieuw wilt opslaan?\n\nU MOET EEN BACK-UP MAKEN VAN U DATA VOORDAT U VERDER GAAT!

translation.bg_bg:
НАПРАВЕТЕ АРХИВ НА ДАННИТЕ ПРЕДИ ПРЕЗАПИСВАНЕ НА ЖУРНАЛ!
Забележа 1: Презаписването на журналите може да отнеме известно време
translation.en_us:
BE SURE TO BACKUP YOUR DATA BEFORE YOU RE-POST ANY JOURNALS!
Note 1: Re-posting journals can take some time
translation.es_cr:
¡RESPALDE SUS DATOS ANTES DE MODIFICAR ALGÚN REGISTRO!
Nota: El modificar registros puede demorarse

ZORG ERVOOR DAT U EEN BACKUP VAN UW GEGEVENS MAAKT VOORDAT U BOEKINGEN OPNIEUW OPSLAAT
Opmerking 1: Opnieuw-Opslaan van Boekingen kan enige tijd duren
translation.pt_br:
CERTIFIQUE-SE DE FAZER CÓPIA DE SEGURANÇA DE SEUS DADOS ANTES DE REENVIAR LANÇAMENTOS!

translation.en_us: The selected journals were re-posted successfully. The number of records re-posted was: %s
translation.es_cr: Los registros seleccionados se modificaron exitósamente. El número de registros modificados fue: %s
translation.nl_nl: De geselecteerde journaals zijn succesvol opgeslagen. Het aantal opgeslagen journaals is: %s
translation.pt_br: Os lançamentos selecionados foram enviados com sucesso. O número de registros enviados foi: %s

translation.bg_bg: Този инструмент изчиства всички стойности за сигурност на данните със срок на годност преди избраната дата. ПРЕДУПРЕЖДЕНИЕ: Тази операция не може да бъде отменена!
translation.en_us: This tool cleans all data security values with a expiration date prior to a selected date. WARNING: This operation cannot be undone!
translation.pt_br: Esta ferramenta limpa todas as informações de valores de segurança com data de expiração anterior à data selecionada date. ATENÇÃO: Esta operação não pode ser desfeita!

translation.bg_bg:
Тук могат да бъдат направени промени в последователността.
ЗАБЕЛЕЖКА 1: PhreeBooks не разрешава дублирани серии - уверете се
translation.en_us:
Changes to the sequencing can be made here.
NOTE 1: PhreeBooks does not allow duplicate sequences
translation.es_cr:
Los cambios a los números de secuencia se pueden hacer aquí.
Nota 1: PhreeBooks no permite números de secuencia duplicados. Asegúrese que el número nuevo para empezar la secuencia no esté en confilco con ninguna transacción existente.
Nota 2: El número next_deposit_num (próximo número de depósito) es generado por el sistema y utiliza la fecha actual.
Nota 3: El número next_check_num (próximo número de cheque) puede ser fijado en la pantalla de pagos antes de salvar el pago y continuará a partir de ese número en transacciones sucesivas.
translation.nl_nl:
Wijzigingen in de volgorde kunnen hier gemaakt worden
Opmerking 1:. PhreeBooks niet omgaan met dubbele reeksen
translation.pt_br:
Alterações na sequência podem ser feitas aqui.
ATENÇÃO 1: PhreeBooks não permite sequências duplicadas

translation.bg_bg: Установяване на шифриращия ключ да се използва ако опцията 'Ширфирането включено' е включена. Ако се сетва за пръв път
translation.en_us: Set the encryption key to use if 'Encryption Enabled' is turned on. If setting for the first time
translation.es_cr: Defina una clave de encriptar a usar si 'Habilite Encriptar' ha sido seleccionada. Si está definiendo por primera vez
translation.nl_nl: zet de versleuteling op 'Versleuteling toegepast' om hem te gebruiken. Bij de eerste keer zal de oude versleutelings sleutel leeg zijn.
translation.pt_br: Utilizar a chave de criptografia se 'Criptografia Habilitada' estiver ligado. Se for a primeira vez

translation.bg_bg: Моля изберете тип компресия за архивирането и опциите долу.

translation.es_cr: Seleccione el tipo de compresión y las opciones siguientes.
translation.id_id: Silahkan pilih jenis kompresi untuk pembuatan cadangan dan pilihan berikut.
translation.nl_nl: Selecteer hier onder het compressie type en opties voor de back up.
translation.pt_br: Por favor selecione a tipo de compressão de backup abaixo.

translation.bg_bg: Zip класът не може да бъде намерен. PHP се нуждае от инсталирана zip библиотека
translation.en_us: The zip class cannot be found. PHP needs the zip library installed to back up with zip compression.
translation.es_cr: La clase Zip no se puede encontrar. PHP necesita que esté instalada la biblioteca zip para hacer el respaldo con compresión zip.
translation.nl_nl: Kan het bestand niet zippen. PHP heeft een zip Bibliotheek nodig om een back-up te maken met zip compressie.
translation.pt_br: A classe zip não foi encontrada. PHP precisa da biblioteca zip instalada para fazer o backup com compressão tipo zip.

translation.bg_bg: Запазване на локално копие на вебсървъра
translation.en_us: Save a local copy in webserver (my_files/backups) directory
translation.es_cr: Salve una copia en el servidor (my_files/backups)
translation.nl_nl: Bewaar een lokaal kopie op de webserver (my_files/backups) directory
translation.pt_br: Salvar uma cópia local no servidor web no diretório(my_files/backups)

translation.bg_bg: Предупреждение! Тази операция ще изтрие и презапише базата данни. Сигурни ли сте
translation.en_us: Warning! This operation will delete and re-write the database. Are you sure you want to continue?
translation.es_cr: ¡Advertencia! Esta operación borrará y luego creará de nuevo la base de datos. ¿Está seguro que quiere continuar?
translation.id_id: Perhatian! Operasi ini akan menghapus dan menulis ulang ke basis data. Anda yakin ingin melanjutkannya?
translation.nl_nl: Waarschuwing! Deze handeling zal de hele database verwijderen en opnieuw schrijven. Weet u zeker dat u door wil gaan?
translation.pt_br: Atenção! Esta operação vai remover e reescrever a base de dados. Tem certeza de que quer fazer isto?

translation.en_us:
Select the. csv file to import and click Import
If there is no bank account column in your .csv then select a bank account from the drop down box.
translation.es_cr:
Seleccione el archivo .csv para importar y presione Importe
Si no hay columna de cuenta de banco en el archivo .csv entonces seleccione la cuenta de la lista plegable.
translation.nl_nl:
Selecteer het .csv bestand dat u wilt importeren en klik op importeer.
Als er geen bank rekening kolom in het .csv bestand staat selecteer er dan een uit het keuze veld.
translation.pt_br:
Seleciona o arquivo .csv para importar e tecle Importar
Se não existe a coluna conta bancária no seu .csv selecione uma conta bancária na caixa de seleção.

translation.ru_ru: A submitted date format was in error
translation.bg_bg: Подаденият формат за дата беше грешен
translation.de_de: A submitted date format was in error
translation.en_us: A submitted date format was in error
translation.pt_br: Um formato de data submetido está errado

translation.en_us: Encryption services depend on a key used to encrypt data in the database. DO NOT LOSE THE KEY
translation.es_cr: Servicios de encriptar dependen de la clave usada para encriptar los datos en la base de datos. NO PIERDA LA CLAVE
translation.nl_nl: Voor versleuteling wordt gebruik gemaakt van een sleutel om data in de database te beveiligen. VERLIES DE SLEUTEL NIET
translation.pt_br: Serviços de criptografia dependem de uma chave utilizada para critografar informação na base de dados. NÃO PERCA A CHAVE

translation.en_us: A color choice must be made
translation.es_cr: ¡Debe seleccionar un color. No parece que este tema tenga ninguno! Seleccione otro tema.
translation.nl_nl: U moet een kleur kiezen. Dit thema blijkt er geen te hebben. Kies een ander thema!
translation.pt_br: Uma escolha de cor deve ser feita

translation.bg_bg: Импортирането може да бъде през XML или CSV формат. Натиснете бутона за образец
translation.en_us: Importing can be through XML or CSV format. Click on the sample button to download a sample file to use for formatting purposes.
translation.es_cr: Un importe puede ser en formato XML o CSV. Presione el botón de muestra para descargar un archivo para usar como ejemplo para formatear sus datos.
translation.nl_nl: Importeren kan gedaan worden met XML of CSV formaat. Klik op de voorbeeld button om een voorbeeld te downloaden als template.
translation.pt_br: Importação pode ser através de XML ou CSV. Clique no botão de exemplo para baixar um arquivo de exemplo para usar em propósitos de formatação.

translation.nl_nl: De lijst hieronder toont de tabellen beschikbaar voor import. Selecteer een formaat
translation.bg_bg: Списъка долу показва свободните таблици за импорт. Изберете формат
translation.en_us: The list below displays the tables available for import. Select a format
translation.es_cr: La lista abajo muestra las tablas disponibles para importar. Seleccione un formato
translation.pt_br: A lista abaixo mostra as tabelas disponpiveis para importação. Selecione um formato

translation.hu_hu: Felhasználó másolása megtörtént. Állítsd be a jelszót és egyéb tulajdonságait a felhasználónak.
translation.bg_bg: Потребителят беше копиран. Моля задайте новата парола и всякакви други свойства за този нов потребител.
translation.en_us: The user was copied. Please set the password and any other properties for this new user.
translation.es_cr: El usuario fue duplicado. Digite la contraseña y el resto de datos de este usuario nuevo.
translation.nl_nl: De gebruiker is gekopieerd. Stel het paswoord en overige instellingen in voor de nieuwe gebruiker.
translation.pt_br: O usuário foi copiado. Por favor defina a senha e demais propriedades para este novo usuário.
